notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.
The bonus armor does not stack with the armor gained from Mekansm and Crimson Guard active abilities.
Does not affect wards, buildings and invulnerable units.
abilities.name: Armor Bonus
abilities.description: Gives +2 armor to all allied units. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

description: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
trivia: In the transition from DotA to Dota 2, the item's name was changed from Nathrezim Buckler to simply Buckler. This is because of the Nathrezim being a race of demons called Dread Lords in Warcraft lore.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 45 health, 0.25 health regen, 0.2% magic resistance, 5.32 armor, 2 attack speed, 0.1% movement speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen, 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 36 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.16% magic resistance, 5.4 armor, 2.5 attack speed, 0.13% movement speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen, 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 36 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.16% magic resistance, 5.32 armor, 2 attack speed, 0.1% movement speed, 30 mana, 0.13 mana regen, 0.18% spell damage and 2 attack damage.
